title: Design Toscano Rampant Lion Crest Shield Medieval Decor Wall Sculpture, Single
features: English and Scottish Warriors Wall Shield - The bravery and strength reflected in the lion-emblazoned crest heralding England and Scotland during the Middle Ages is celebrated in this gorgeous wall sculpture
Emblazon Your Castle Walls - This medieval style shield plaque is reminiscent of those that some of history's fiercest soldiers paired with armor and a sword as they fought toward victory

High Quality Sculpture - Hand-cast using real crushed stone bonded with durable designer resin, our heraldic Lion Shield is topped with a UV resistant finish and hand painted in in antique gold and ancient green

Design Toscano Wall decor - Exclusive to the Design Toscano brand, this unique work of decorative wall art stands alone or anchors a collection of Medieval artifacts in your home. It also makes a great gift!
Our La Dolce Vita wall decor measures 22"Wx4"Dx8"H and weighs 2 lbs. making it the perfect accent on a kitchen or living room wall
description: The bravery and strength reflected in the lion-emblazoned crest heralding England and Scotland during the Middle Ages is celebrated in this quality designer resin Toscano exclusive. Especially impressive in pairs, whether flanking a fireplace or entryway, the crowned king of beasts is hand-painted in antique gold and ancient green. 7"Wx2½ "Dx14½ "H. 2 lbs.
